headline: Microsoft Corporation (MSFT) Sees Nearly 29% Upside as Truist Lifts Target
summary: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is among the best stocks to buy now according to AI. Terry Tillman, an analyst at Truist, has increased the price target on Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) to $675 from $650, while maintaining a Buy rating on the stock. This potential upside of nearly 29% from the current level is driven by robust […]
